Gloom.help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.targetHelp: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Soul_Tentacles.help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows the souls of the damned to slip into our reality. These Soul Tentacles will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while they drain their life. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Soul_Tentacles.targetHelp: The Soul Tentacles are immobilizing you.

Darkest_Night.help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. You must be level 41 and have Gloom or Soul Tentacles before selecting this power. Recharge: Moderate
Darkest_Night.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.
Darkest_Night.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest} and all foes nearby.
Darkest_Night.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage and chance to hit with their {PowerName}.

Dark_Obliteration.help: You hurl a large blast of negative energy that violently explodes on impact, exposing the dark power of the Netherworld to all foes near the target. Dark Obliteration can reduce the Accuracy of all affected targets. You must be level 41 and have Gloom or Soul Tentacles before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Summon_Widow.help: Ghost Widow has assigned a beautiful but deadly Blood Widow assassins for you to command. Their weapons of choice include wrist retractable mounted razors and darts, all tipped in deadly poison. Your access to this Blood Widow is very limited, and you can only summon her once every 15 minutes and she will leave after 4 minutes, until defeated, or until you leave a zone or mission. You must be level 44 and have two other Soul Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long
Summon_Widow.shortHelp: Summon Blood Widow: Melee Moderate DMG(Lethal)
